Sequence Information.Peptide Name: rCRAMP (rat cathelin-related antimicrobial peptide, natural AMPs; cathelicidin; mammals; animals; UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: M2 macrophage, islet beta cells, delta cells; Norway rat,Rattus norvegicus

Literature Information.Literature: Activity against E. coli DH5a or ML-35p, P. aeruginosa PAO1, P. aeruginosa MR3007, S. aureus 93918 or ATCC 33591 MRSA (MIC 0.25-2 uM). The MIC increased from 2.4 to 18 uM in the case of MRSA with an increase in NaCl concentration to 100 mM. Updated Jan2017.
Literature Information.Author: Travis SM, Anderson NN, Forsyth WR, Espiritu C, Conway BD, Greenberg EP, McCray PB Jr, Lehrer RI, Welsh MJ, Tack BF.2000
Literature Information.Title: Bactericidal activity of mammalian cathelicidin-derived peptides.
